formattedAddress: 10 E 53rd St, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 10 E 53rd St, New York, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text: I connected my close friend with Benjamin and he referred her to a great agent. Not only was the agent super helpful, but Benjamin was also super communicative during the process and really cared about her home search. Would definitely recommend Benjamin for his referral network and any NYC real estate needs. He truly cared and was so helpful and knowledgeable!

text.text: I connected my close friend with Benjamin and he referred her to a great agent. Not only was the agent super helpful, but Benjamin was also super communicative during the process and really cared about her home search. originalText.text:
I once had my real estate license in both New York City and in Sarasota, Florida.  I mention this because I come from a family of investors (my grandfather and his wife came from Europe with nothing and found a way to gain wealth from real property).  When it was time to list my flat on West 57th,. Street,  I hired a compass team and met Benjamin Anderson for the first time.
Benjamin is all of the following and more: focused, amiable, quick to see the way a property can and should be marketed, a  man that every client wishes to meet.  And moreover:  his attention is always on  the client, even if he is handling multiple listings at the same time,  I got the feeling that I was his only client.  His communication skills cannot be taught: they are an inate part of this fine man.  He helped, so much, to keep me calm at a time when there were many, many details to handle.

He found the perfect buyer for my flat and welcomed the buyer and his family for multiple showings.  I am sure that the buyer and his family were totally impressed with Benjamin as I was.   Contract signed!  I am just in awe of Benjamin:  I suspect that he will continue to be an extraordinary real estate professional.  He has found his authentic voice:  and that is such a key to success in any field.  But in real estate, it is essential.   Job well done!   Thanks, Benjamin.

originalText.text: Benjamin was so helpful and patient with my move to NYC from California. He went above and beyond to ensure that my move was seamless—and he was also a great resource for the Chelsea and Hell's Kitchen market since that is where I was wanting to move. He even went the extra mile to show me units over a video call on a weekend! I'll definitely use Benjamin for my next purchase or anything when it comes to real estate in the NYC market. Looking forward to future collaboration!

originalText.text: I cannot say enough about Benjamin- he’s professional, communicative and super easy to work with!! I’ve worked with him twice and I have recommended him to all my friends and clients who all love him. I cannot wait to find my next place and work with him again. He’s such a talented, terrific and super knowledgeable person to work with especially if you're looking to buy in Chelsea or Hell's Kitchen!

originalText.text: It was such a pleasure working with Benjamin. I really appreciated his guidance and ability to make it a fun and easy process. I will definitely be working with him again in the future.
